004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.pidwrappers;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.AnalogInput;
008import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.AnalogPotentiometer;
009import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSource;
010import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSourceType;
011
012/**
013 * Wrapper so that PIDSource is implemented for AnalogPotentiometer for old PIDController.
014 *
015 * <p>This class is provided by the OldCommands VendorDep
016 *
017 * @deprecated Use {@link edu.wpi.first.math.controller.PIDController} which doesn't require this
018 *     wrapper.
019 */
020@Deprecated(since = "2022", forRemoval = true)
021public class PIDAnalogPotentiometer extends AnalogPotentiometer implements PIDSource {
022  protected PIDSourceType m_pidSource = PIDSourceType.kDisplacement;
023
024  public PIDAnalogPotentiometer(int channel, double fullRange, double offset) {
025    super(channel, fullRange, offset);
026  }
027
028  public PIDAnalogPotentiometer(AnalogInput input, double fullRange, double offset) {
029    super(input, fullRange, offset);
030  }
031
032  public PIDAnalogPotentiometer(int channel, double scale) {
033    super(channel, scale);
034  }
035
036  public PIDAnalogPotentiometer(AnalogInput input, double scale) {
037    super(input, scale);
038  }
039
040  public PIDAnalogPotentiometer(int channel) {
041    super(channel);
042  }
043
044  public PIDAnalogPotentiometer(AnalogInput input) {
045    super(input);
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public void setPIDSourceType(PIDSourceType pidSource) {
050    if (!pidSource.equals(PIDSourceType.kDisplacement)) {
051      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Only displacement PID is allowed for potentiometers.");
052    }
053    m_pidSource = pidSource;
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public PIDSourceType getPIDSourceType() {
058    return m_pidSource;
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Implement the PIDSource interface.
063   *
064   * @return The current reading.
065   */
066  @Override
067  public double pidGet() {
068    return get();
069  }
070}
